word:
Chap. 183 - To the Men Who Occupy Responsible Positions in the Work

                              "Sunnyside," Cooranbong, July, 1, '96. 

                                                           B-4-1896 

To the Men who occupy Responsible Positions in the Work, 


     Dear Brethren:- 
     I cannot sleep after twelve o'clock; for matters have been laid open before me during the past night that have been presented to me from time to time since the Conference at Minneapolis. Some things which were then shown me, I could not fully comprehend, but I saw that methods were being devised and planned which could bring in corrupted principles. Some matters have been presented to me several times, in order that I might comprehend them.
